thread.title: Drake Shouts Out Sasha Obama For Wearing OVO Gear
thread.title_full: Drake Shouts Out Sasha Obama For Wearing OVO Gear

author: Somhairle Cinnsealach
title: Drake Shouts Out Sasha Obama For Wearing OVO Gear
text:
A photo posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Jan 15, 2017 at 6:17am PST 2 
Drake was quick to pay tribute to President Barack Obama on Instagram as the outgoing President made his farewell speech, but it was a different member of the Obama clan that Drizzy had praise for on Monday. 
The Canadian rapper shared a photo of the president’s youngest daughter Sasha Obama rocking an OVO dad hat, accompanied by the caption “Style Popper” (throwing in the ‘OK’ emoji and the rocket ship emoji for good measure). 
It’s not the first time that either of the Obama daughters has been seen wearing rap brands: Sasha’s older sister Malia was photographed wearing Joey Bada$$’s Pro Era line in January 2015. A photo posted by Official Pro Era Instagram (@proerarecords) on Jan 5, 2015 at 6:12am PST 
Joey Bada$$ appreciated that endorsement just like Drake did, sharing the picture on his Instagram account, but quickly became paranoid that the Secret Service was keeping tabs on him . 
“I’d love to thank Malia in person,” he told the New York Post last July. “It’ll be a weird encounter, because the Secret Service guys are gonna be there, and they’re gonna be tapping the whole conversation. But nonetheless, I’m down.” 
We imagine that Drake isn’t quite as worried as Joey was, if for no other reason than the Secret Service will probably has their hands full with the inauguration this week… Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You!
